backend/main.mo: Defines admin, vehicle, media, blog, and analytics data types and initializes authorization and storage mixins for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Declares feature evidence linking paginated media fetching to specific frontend hooks and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root element and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Provides instructions for rebuilding, deploying, and validating the frontend canister including route checks and media manager tests.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Admin route guard that enforces authentication with an optional emergency bypass for debugging.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the main admin layout with sidebar navigation, active-route detection, and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage with migration from legacy keys, cookie fallback, and token retrieval utilities.
Defines a debug-only emergency bypass that auto-grants Super Admin access when enabled.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access‑denied screen with a prompt to return to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Renders a simple admin page header with title, optional subtitle, and optional action area.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating and editing blog posts, including media selection and comment management.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table with search, custom columns, published status display, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Home: Manages a list of home page banner images with add, remove, reorder, and picker/upload support.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Displays and filters all media assets with delete functionality, handling images and videos.
Dialog for searching and selecting media assets from the library with preview and error handling.
Button component for uploading image or video files and creating media asset records.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog for adding or editing promotions with fields for content, image selection, and publish state.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog form for creating or editing testimonials with fields for text, rating, image selection, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Complex dialog for adding or editing vehicles including basic info, media, variants, technical specs, and commercial feature options.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Renders checkboxes for commercial vehicle feature flags and updates the features object on toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Provides form inputs to edit technical spec fields and manage a list of additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of vehicle variants, including their price adjustments and feature lists.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Defines React Query mutations for CRUD operations on vehicles, promotions, testimonials, and other admin CMS entities using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Empty placeholder export kept for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Handles admin session validation, login flow, and optional emergency bypass session creation.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: UI page for testing admin login by sending credentials to the backend and displaying results.
Login page handling admin authentication, emergency bypass redirect, and form submission.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Admin profile editor that loads user data, updates profile fields, and saves changes through CMS hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Admin interface to list, search, create, edit, and delete blog posts with modal dialogs and CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard displaying counts of key CMS resources such as vehicles, promotions, and leads.
Page managing contact and credit simulation leads with search, filtering, and delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media management page for uploading assets, configuring homepage banners, and browsing the media library.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting promotions with CRUD dialogs and toast feedback.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin interface to view, filter, create, edit, and delete testimonials using CRUD components and notifications.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin page for managing vehicles with category filtering, search, and full CRUD operations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays extended visitor statistics in card layout with auto-refreshed metrics and descriptive info.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: Defines CSS variables and styles for the admin panel layout, navigation, cards, and themed components.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all public and admin routes using TanStack Router and wraps pages with their respective layouts.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: A comment form with validation for name, email, and content, supporting replies via parentId and reset behavior.
Renders threaded blog comments with reply support, showing nested replies and toggling a reply form.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Displays like, share, and comment buttons with local like tracking and interaction counts.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: A contact submission form that validates required fields, sends data via a mutation hook, and resets on success.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: A credit simulation request form validating key fields and submitting data through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Global React error boundary that catches render errors and shows a fallback UI with a reload option.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeMainBan: An auto-rotating banner image slider with fallback for single or no images.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the footer with contact info, social links, operating hours, and visitor stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Defines the public page layout with navbar, optional hero, content area, CTA section, footer, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom bar offering quick actions (call, WhatsApp, credit form) and a popover menu.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Bottom sheet menu listing navigation links for mobile use.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Top navigation bar with brand logo, links, WhatsApp button, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Reusable section title component showing an icon and heading.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Displays a call‑to‑action section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Simple hero banner with welcome text and icon.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Vehicle card displaying image, details, price, badges, and actions for detail view or consultation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login, logout, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as vehicles, promotions, blog posts, interactions, and comments.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Implements automatic visitor and page‑view tracking with periodic presence updates using mutations from useQueries.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and banner/CTA animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with likes, shares, comments, and interaction handling using related hooks.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Renders a grid of blog posts with images and links to individual article pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Displays detailed info for a commercial vehicle, including variants, pricing, features, and contact actions.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists commercial vehicles grouped by duty class with loading states and category sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact form, dealer contact details, location map, and sales consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring banner sliders, featured vehicles, CTA banner, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed info for a passenger vehicle with variant selection, pricing, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles with a loading state and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Shows promotion cards with images, descriptions, validity dates, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays customer testimonials with ratings, images, and basic customer info.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin route lists for manual smoke testing and provides helpers to generate checklists and validate router configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Describes overall project state, architecture notes, known issues, and version metadata for the automotive web platform.
